title: Legal Executive Assistant / Operations Coordinator
job_overview:
We’re looking for a highly organized Legal Executive Assistant / Operations Coordinator to support our legal and operational functions. This role involves managing schedules, handling confidential documents, coordinating internal processes, and ensuring smooth day-to-day operations. The ideal candidate has experience supporting legal professionals or executives, is detail-oriented, and excels at juggling multiple priorities. Strong communication written and verbal skills, discretion, and the ability to anticipate needs are essential. This position is perfect for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, professional environment and enjoys keeping things running efficiently behind the scenes.
